replies.body: Logic and reasoning are impecable, with an excellent attempt to portray why this champion in this build path frustrates you! I rate it 9/10.
no point anymore. anyone that plays this game knows why im saying this.
It was just a mockery. And if you're still worried about this, check the PBE patches please.
He has nerfs on the PBE
Fizz is one of those champs where they nerf him and he goes to complete shit and I pick {{champion:14}}  vs fizz free win

He hasnt recieved a decent nerf. Even the cd increase on his e in tiny.

How the hell does sion beat a tank fizz anyway.
2 seconds is not tiny.  That is a large part of his mobility and survivability (even as a "tank").
Fizz has access to alot of cdr now on core items tank or assasin, so i stand by what i said
at 40% cdr (tank Fizz shouldn't have 45% I think), those 2 seconds become 1.2 seconds.  That's still quite a bit in a teamfight or skirmish.

You think thats still to long a cd for an immunity?

Hell you often see him run without flash because its on auch a short cd...
It is still a short cd for an immunity, but that is the ability that makes Fizz Fizz.  If it got an actually long cd, he'd be near useless regardless of build.

How would he be useless? Because he couldnt zhonyias and e away after killing a carry?

He would be less forgiving yes but he would still be able to do his job.
His E Ap ratio needs nerf.
